title: Sentry Span Attribute Schema
description: Describes an attribute and how it's meant to be used

key.description: The name of the attribute, for ex. http.route

has_dynamic_suffix.description: If an attribute has a dynamic suffix, for example http.response.header.<key> where <key> is dynamic

type.description: The type of the attribute value

pii.description: If an attribute can have pii. Is either true, false or maybe. Optionally include a reason about why it has PII or not

example.description: An example value of the attribute

deprecation.description: If an attribute was deprecated, and what it was replaced with

_status.description: How the attribute should be handled in the ingestion pipeline. 'backfill' copies the value to the new name. 'normalize' moves the value to the new name. In both cases, existing values for the new name will not be overwritten. The attribute should be backfilled for 90 days before status is set to normalize.

alias.description: If there are attributes that alias to this attribute

sdks.description: If an attribute is SDK specific, list the SDKs that use this attribute. This is not an exhaustive list, there might be SDKs that send this attribute that are is not documented here.

changelog.description: A list of changelog entries tracking how this attribute has changed across versions
